item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello there !! I am Anjali, 24, born in Agra, the city of Taj (India). I am a Software Professional and like to connect with people of different background. I am always open for the exciting projects and challenges. I am graduated in Computer Science Engineering and currently working with a Tech-Startup in Bengaluru, India. Few things which I really enjoy doing/working with: Technologies Passionate about it coz it has beautifully evolved the life of every species on this Earth.

ANR Software Pvt.

item.description: Sharda University G.Noida, India B.Tech Major: Computer Science and Engineering 2010-2014 Visit : Sharda University St. Fidelis Senior Secondary School Aligarh, India Undergrads Major: Science 2008-2010

item.title: Projects & Articles
item.description: Projects Cmpute.io A SaaS solution which is built on top of AWS (Amazon Web Services), automates the Job scheduling process for various Use Cases by auto biding AWS instances and optimize the AWS Cost. I am responsible for end-to-end product testing by creating and executing all the manual and automated Test Cases. Also perform API Testing,UI/UX testing, analyze core functional performance while biding and running Jobs using AWS instances.
